channel.title: RS Recreation (2006 Remake) - Reviving the best of RuneScape! [Alpha Release!]
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-1hiinEPfIo8/T0KufBDvqDI/AAAAAAAAAWo/JlUvmjBj9S0/s1600/Runescape-Logo.png[/img] [left][img]http://www.youtube.com/favicon.ico[/img] [url=http://youtube.com/RSRecreation]YouTube.[/url] [img]https://twitter.com/favicon.ico[/img] [url=http://twitter.com/RSRecreation]Twitter.[/url] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/imijbl.png[/img] [url=http://rs-recreation.com]Website.[/url][/left]
Welcome to the official advertisement thread for the beta release of what is possibly one of the most advanced, community-friendly remakes out today. RS Recreation has been in development for some time and now we are pleased to say that we are finally ready to embrace our expanding community with this developmental success! Alpha takes place at [u][b]exactly[/b][/u] 00:00 GMT + 0, as soon as Friday 11th is upon us! Don't miss your change to get involved!
The journey starts now. Register free at [URL=http://RS-Recreation.com]RS-Recreation.com[/URL]
If you would like a say in the decided experience rate for release, vote on the poll [URL=http://rs-recreation.com/polls/index.php]here.[/URL] [/CENTER] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2EJAV.gif[/img][B]Combat[/B] (Melee)
[ul][li]Max hit formulae[/li] [li][color=green]Accuracy formulae[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]X-Logging[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Defensive bonuses[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Weapon speeds and animations[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Attack styles[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=yellow]Barrows degrades[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Barrows effects[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Weapon poison[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120121223319/runescape/images/d/d8/Ranged_icon_highscores.png[/img] [B]Ranged[/B]
[ul][li][color=green]Projectile clipping[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Following[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Bow and arrow requirements[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Distances (Long ranged = 9)[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Rapid attacks faster[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Arrows show on ground[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://i858.photobucket.com/albums/ab149/Nick_Z/Runescape%20Icons/th_Magic-icon.png[/img] [B]Magic[/B]
[ul][li][color=green]Projectile clipping[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Following[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Rune requirements[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Level requirements[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Teleports[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Stuns[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Binds[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Enchantments[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Alchemy[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=yellow]Teleother[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Autocasting[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Ancients & Effects[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205042557/runescape/images/archive/2/24/20091215022525!Prayer-icon.png[/img] [B]Prayer[/B]
[ul][li][color=green]Prayer requirements[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Correct draining speeds[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Prayer renewal[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Correct prayer effects[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://www.zybez.net/img/genimg/gettingstart/stats.gif[/img] [B]Skills[/B]
[ul][li][color=red]Agility[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Thieving[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Runecrafting[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Crafting[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=yellow]Slayer[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Mining[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Smithing[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Fishing[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Cooking[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Woodcutting[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Firemaking[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Fletching[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Farming[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=yellow]Herblore[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fqb62.png[/img] [B]Minigames[/B]
[ul][li][color=yellow]Barrows[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=yellow]Fight Pits[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Fight Caves[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]Games Room[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]Castle Wars[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/R4MMI.png[/img] [B]Music[/B]
[ul][li][color=green]Regional music[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]Music player[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]Unlockable tracks[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Correct music for locations[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=yellow]Sounds[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img] [B]Quests[/B] (Completed only)
[ul][li][color=green]Tutorial Island[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://www.tip.it/runescape/images/items/89.gif[/img] [B]Misc.[/B] (More to come)
[ul][li][color=red]Barrows Repairing[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=yellow]Clue Scrolls[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]Cats[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=yellow]Doors[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=yellow]Ladders/Stairs[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Skill Interfaces[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Toll gate[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=yellow]Random Events[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[CENTER] More screenshots to come [img]http://i.imgur.com/AWD3E.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/H9e5b.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IQAgK.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zqPMJ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wCD7I.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aenIE.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/46Sju.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HR0Rg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8WPtS.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/v4hRV.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4ey6t.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7DiHg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MHpxn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Bk4pD.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/c0co8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aKPgf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JvDII.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/19I7H.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ACbMJ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AXfx0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7966Y.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/5Etd2.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/vvw1S.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/CgP8z.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/axEo2.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/8iMEz.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/1UBDi.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/TB80D.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/9wk1P.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/5j9Gs.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/KUZFz.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/J26yo.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/S6slw.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/iB4dL.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/4q8pc.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/cPtDG.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/uCaBZ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/fsr5p.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Is9yQ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/NPN71.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/AsH5l.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Spit7.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/wA6xk.png[/img] [img]http://www.rs-recreation.com/img/dailyscreenshots/Runecrafting.PNG[/img]
So what are you waiting for? Join [URL=http://rs-recreation.com]now[/URL]![/CENTER]

item.title: RS Recreation (2006 Remake) - Reviving the best of RuneScape! [Alpha Release!]

This is 2006Scape or to be more specific either 2006Memorys or 2006Remade that I released. End of story goodluck

@frobols wrote:

This looks very nice. Is this still actively worked on, or is it discontinued? It actually looks really nice and I am thinking of using it once fixed. Or, if it gets fixed.

item.title: RS Recreation (2006 Remake) - Reviving the best of RuneScape! [Alpha Release!]
item.dc:creator: @The_Unholy The Unholy
item.description:
@The_Unholy wrote:

Thanks for the support, our time is small but we’ve been working our asses off to create this and we’re all honestly so proud of our work. We just hope our community enjoys it. I look forward to seeing you there

item.title: RS Recreation (2006 Remake) - Reviving the best of RuneScape! [Alpha Release!]
item.dc:creator: @The_Unholy The Unholy
item.description:
@The_Unholy wrote:

[CENTER]
[left] YouTube.
Twitter.
Website.[/left]

Welcome to the official advertisement thread for the beta release of what is possibly one of the most advanced, community-friendly remakes out today. RS Recreation has been in development for some time and now we are pleased to say that we are finally ready to embrace our expanding community with this developmental success! Alpha takes place at exactly 00:00 GMT + 0, as soon as Friday 11th is upon us! Don’t miss your change to get involved!

The journey starts now. Register free at RS-Recreation.com

If you would like a say in the decided experience rate for release, vote on the poll here.
[/CENTER]
Combat (Melee)

[ul][li]Max hit formulae[/li]
[li][color=green]Accuracy formulae[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]X-Logging[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Defensive bonuses[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Weapon speeds and animations[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Attack styles[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=yellow]Barrows degrades[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Barrows effects[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Weapon poison[/COLOR][/li][/ul]

Ranged

[ul][li][color=green]Projectile clipping[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Following[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Bow and arrow requirements[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Distances (Long ranged = 9)[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Rapid attacks faster[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Arrows show on ground[/COLOR][/li][/ul]

Magic

[ul][li][color=green]Projectile clipping[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Following[/COLOR][/li]

[li][color=green]Level requirements[/COLOR][/li]

[li][color=green]Binds[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Enchantments[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Alchemy[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=yellow]Teleother[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Autocasting[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Ancients & Effects[/COLOR][/li][/ul]

Prayer

[ul][li][color=green]Prayer requirements[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Correct draining speeds[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Prayer renewal[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Correct prayer effects[/COLOR][/li][/ul]

Skills

Minigames

Music
